00547     friend const sc_fxval_fast operator << ( const sc_fxval_fast&, int );
00548     friend const sc_fxval_fast operator >> ( const sc_fxval_fast&, int );
00549 
00550 
00551     // binary functions
00552 
00553 #define DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,tp)                                                \
00554     friend void fnc ( sc_fxval_fast&, const sc_fxval_fast&, tp );             \
00555     friend void fnc ( sc_fxval_fast&, tp, const sc_fxval_fast& );
00556 
00557 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
00558 #define DECL_BIN_FNC_OTHER(fnc)                                               \
00559     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,int64)                                                 \
00560     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,uint64)                                                \
00561     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_int_base&)                                    \
00562     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_uint_base&)                                   \
00563     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_signed&)                                      \
00564     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_unsigned&)
00565 #else
00566 #define DECL_BIN_FNC_OTHER(fnc)
00567 #endif
00568 
00569 #define DECL_BIN_FNC(fnc)                                                     \
00570     friend void fnc ( sc_fxval_fast&, const sc_fxval_fast&,                   \
00571                       const sc_fxval_fast& );                                 \
00572     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,int)                                                   \
00573     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,unsigned int)                                          \
00574     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,long)                                                  \
00575     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,unsigned long)                                         \
00576     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,float)                                                \
00577     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,double)                                                \
00578     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const char*)                                           \
00579     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_fxval&)                                       \
00580     DECL_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_fxnum&)                                       \
00581     DECL_BIN_FNC_OTHER(fnc)
00582 
00583     DECL_BIN_FNC(mult)
00584     DECL_BIN_FNC(div)
00585     DECL_BIN_FNC(add)
00586     DECL_BIN_FNC(sub)
00587 
00588 #undef DECL_BIN_FNC_T
00589 #undef DECL_BIN_FNC_OTHER
00590 #undef DECL_BIN_FNC
00591 
00592     friend void lshift( sc_fxval_fast&, const sc_fxval_fast&, int );
00593     friend void rshift( sc_fxval_fast&, const sc_fxval_fast&, int );
00594 
00595 
00596     // relational (including equality) operators
00597 
00598 #define DECL_REL_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
00599     friend bool operator op ( const sc_fxval_fast&, tp );                     \
00600     friend bool operator op ( tp, const sc_fxval_fast& );
00601 
00602 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
00603 #define DECL_REL_OP_OTHER(op)                                                 \
00604     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,int64)                                                   \
00605     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,uint64)                                                  \
00606     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
00607     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
00608     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_signed&)                                        \
00609     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const sc_unsigned&)
00610 #else
00611 #define DECL_REL_OP_OTHER(op)
00612 #endif
00613 
00614 #define DECL_REL_OP(op)                                                       \
00615     friend bool operator op ( const sc_fxval_fast&, const sc_fxval_fast& );   \
00616     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,int)                                                     \
00617     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,unsigned int)                                            \
00618     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,long)                                                    \
00619     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,unsigned long)                                           \
00620     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,float)                                                  \
00621     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,double)                                                  \
00622     DECL_REL_OP_T(op,const char*)                                             \
00623     DECL_REL_OP_OTHER(op)
00624 
00625     DECL_REL_OP(<)
00626     DECL_REL_OP(<=)
00627     DECL_REL_OP(>)
00628     DECL_REL_OP(>=)
00629     DECL_REL_OP(==)
00630     DECL_REL_OP(!=)
00631 
00632 #undef DECL_REL_OP_T
00633 #undef DECL_REL_OP_OTHER
00634 #undef DECL_REL_OP
00635 
00636 
00637     // assignment operators
00638 
00639 #define DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
00640     sc_fxval_fast& operator op( tp );
00641 
00642 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
00643 #define DECL_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)                                                 \
00644     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,int64)                                                   \
00645     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,uint64)                                                  \
00646     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
00647     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
00648     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_signed&)                                        \
00649     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_unsigned&)
00650 #else
00651 #define DECL_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)
00652 #endif
00653

00655     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,int)                                                     \
00656     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,unsigned int)                                            \
00657     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,long)                                                    \
00658     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,unsigned long)                                           \
00659     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,float)                                                  \
00660     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,double)                                                  \
00661     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const char*)                                             \

00663     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
00664     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxnum&)                                         \
00665     DECL_ASN_OP_T(op,const sc_fxnum_fast&)                                    \
00666     DECL_ASN_OP_OTHER(op)
00667 
00668     DECL_ASN_OP(=)
00669

00679 #undef DECL_ASN_OP_OTHER
00680 #undef DECL_ASN_OP
00681 
00682 
00683     // auto-increment and auto-decrement
00684 
00685     const sc_fxval_fast operator ++ ( int );
00686     const sc_fxval_fast operator -- ( int );
00687 
00688     sc_fxval_fast& operator ++ ();
00689     sc_fxval_fast& operator -- ();
00690 
00691 
00692     // implicit conversion
00693 
00694     operator double() const;            // necessary evil!
00695 
00696 
00697     // explicit conversion to primitive types
00698 
00699     short          to_short() const;
00700     unsigned short to_ushort() const;
00701     int            to_int() const;
00702     unsigned int   to_uint() const;
00703     long           to_long() const;
00704     unsigned long  to_ulong() const;
00705     int64          to_int64() const;
00706     uint64         to_uint64() const;
00707     float          to_float() const;
00708     double         to_double() const;
00709 
00710 
00711     // explicit conversion to character string
00712 
00713     const std::string to_string() const;
00714     const std::string to_string( sc_numrep ) const;
00715     const std::string to_string( sc_numrep, bool ) const;
00716     const std::string to_string( sc_fmt ) const;
00717     const std::string to_string( sc_numrep, sc_fmt ) const;
00718     const std::string to_string( sc_numrep, bool, sc_fmt ) const;
00719 
00720     const std::string to_dec() const;
00721     const std::string to_bin() const;
00722     const std::string to_oct() const;
00723     const std::string to_hex() const;
00724 
00725 
00726     // query value
00727 
00728     bool is_neg() const;
00729     bool is_zero() const;
00730     bool is_nan() const;
00731     bool is_inf() const;
00732     bool is_normal() const;
00733 
00734     bool rounding_flag() const;
00735 
00736 
00737     // print or dump content
00738 
00739     void print( ::std::ostream& = ::std::cout ) const;
00740     void scan( ::std::istream& = ::std::cin );
00741     void dump( ::std::ostream& = ::std::cout ) const;
00742 
00743 
00744     // internal use only;
00745     bool get_bit( int ) const;
00746 
00747 protected:
00748 
00749     sc_fxval_fast_observer* lock_observer() const;
00750     void unlock_observer( sc_fxval_fast_observer* ) const;
00751 
00752 
00753     static double from_string( const char* );
00754 
00755 private:
00756 
00757     double                          m_val;
00758 
00759     mutable sc_fxval_fast_observer* m_observer;
00760 
00761 };

00764 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00765 
00766 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00767 //  CLASS : sc_fxval
00768 //
00769 //  Fixed-point value type; arbitrary precision.
00770 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00771 
00772 // protected method
00773 
00774 inline
00775 sc_fxval_observer*
00776 sc_fxval::observer() const
00777 {
00778     return m_observer;
00779 }
00780 
00781 
00782 // internal use only;
00783 inline
00784 sc_fxval::sc_fxval( scfx_rep* a )
00785 : m_rep( a != 0 ? a : new scfx_rep ),
00786   m_observer( 0 )
00787 {}
00788 
00789 
00790 // public constructors
00791 
00792 inline
00793 sc_fxval::sc_fxval( sc_fxval_observer* observer_ )
00794 : m_rep( new scfx_rep ),
00795   m_observer( observer_ )
00796 {
00797     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
00798     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )
00799 }
00800 
00801 inline
00802 sc_fxval::sc_fxval( const sc_fxval& a,
00803                     sc_fxval_observer* observer_ )
00804 : m_rep( new scfx_rep( *a.m_rep ) ),
00805   m_observer( observer_ )
00806 {
00807     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
00808     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
00809     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )
00810     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
00811 }
00812 
00813 #define DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,arg)                                                   \
00814 inline                                                                        \
00815 sc_fxval::sc_fxval( tp a,                                                     \
00816                     sc_fxval_observer* observer_ )                            \
00817 : m_rep( new scfx_rep( arg ) ),                                               \
00818   m_observer( observer_ )                                                     \
00819 {                                                                             \
00820     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_                                                \
00821     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )                                     \
00822     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
00823 }
00824 
00825 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_A(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,a)
00826 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_B(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,a.to_double())
00827 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_C(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,a.value())
00828 
00829 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(int)
00830 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(unsigned int)
00831 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(long)
00832 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(unsigned long)
00833 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(float)
00834 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(double)
00835 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(const char*)
00836 DEFN_CTOR_T_B(const sc_fxval_fast&)
00837 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
00838 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(int64)
00839 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(uint64)
00840 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_int_base&)
00841 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_uint_base&)
00842 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(const sc_signed&)
00843 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(const sc_unsigned&)
00844 #endif
00845 
00846 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T
00847 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_A
00848 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_B
00849 #undef DEFN_CTOR_T_C
00850 
00851 
00852 inline
00853 sc_fxval::~sc_fxval()
00854 {
00855     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_DESTRUCT_( *this )
00856     delete m_rep;
00857 }
00858 
00859 
00860 // internal use only;
00861 inline
00862 const scfx_rep*
00863 sc_fxval::get_rep() const
00864 {
00865     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
00866     return m_rep;
00867 }
00868 
00869 // internal use only;
00870 inline
00871 void
00872 sc_fxval::set_rep( scfx_rep* rep_ )
00873 {
00874     delete m_rep;
00875     m_rep = rep_;
00876     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
00877 }
00878 
00879 
00880 // unary operators
00881 
00882 inline
00883 const sc_fxval
00884 sc_fxval::operator - () const
00885 {
00886     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
00887     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::neg_scfx_rep( *m_rep ) );
00888 }
00889 
00890 inline
00891 const sc_fxval&
00892 sc_fxval::operator + () const
00893 {
00894     // SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
00895     return *this;
00896 }
00897 
00898 
00899 // unary functions
00900 
00901 inline
00902 void
00903 neg( sc_fxval& c, const sc_fxval& a )
00904 {
00905     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
00906     delete c.m_rep;
00907     c.m_rep = sc_dt::neg_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep );
00908     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
00909 }

00911 
00912 // binary operators
00913 
00914 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,tp)                                              \
00915 inline                                                                        \
00916 const sc_fxval                                                                \
00917 operator op ( const sc_fxval& a, tp b )                                       \
00918 {                                                                             \
00919     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
00920     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
00921     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.m_rep ) );      \
00922 }                                                                             \
00923                                                                               \
00924 inline                                                                        \
00925 const sc_fxval                                                                \
00926 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxval& b )                                       \
00927 {                                                                             \
00928     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
00929     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
00930     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *tmp.m_rep, *b.m_rep ) );      \
00931 }
00932 
00933 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
00934 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)                                             \
00935 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,int64)                                                   \
00936 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,uint64)                                                  \
00937 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
00938 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
00939 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_signed&)                                        \
00940 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_unsigned&)
00941 #else
00942 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)
00943 #endif
00944 
00945 #define DEFN_BIN_OP(op,fnc)                                                   \
00946 inline                                                                        \
00947 const sc_fxval                                                                \
00948 operator op ( const sc_fxval& a, const sc_fxval& b )                          \
00949 {                                                                             \
00950     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
00951     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
00952     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.m_rep ) );        \
00953 }                                                                             \
00954                                                                               \
00955 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,int)                                                     \
00956 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,unsigned int)                                            \
00957 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,long)                                                    \
00958 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,unsigned long)                                           \
00959 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,float)                                                  \
00960 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,double)                                                  \
00961 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const char*)                                             \
00962 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
00963 DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)
00964 
00965 DEFN_BIN_OP(*,mult)
00966 DEFN_BIN_OP(+,add)
00967 DEFN_BIN_OP(-,sub)
00968 // don't use macro
00969 //DEFN_BIN_OP(/,div)
00970 inline
00971 const sc_fxval
00972 operator / ( const sc_fxval& a, const sc_fxval& b )
00973 {
00974     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
00975     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )
00976     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::div_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.m_rep ) );
00977 }
00978 
00979 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,int)
00980 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,unsigned int)
00981 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,long)
00982 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,unsigned long)
00983 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,float)
00984 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,double)
00985 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const char*)
00986 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_fxval_fast&)
00987 //DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(/,div)
00988 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
00989 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,int64)                                                   \
00990 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,uint64)                                                  \
00991 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
00992 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
00993 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_signed&)                                        \
00994 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,div,const sc_unsigned&)
00995 #endif
00996 
00997 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP_T
00998 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER
00999 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP

01002 inline
01003 const sc_fxval
01004 operator << ( const sc_fxval& a, int b )
01005 {
01006     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01007     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::lsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b ) );
01008 }
01009 
01010 inline
01011 const sc_fxval
01012 operator >> ( const sc_fxval& a, int b )
01013 {
01014     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01015     return sc_fxval( sc_dt::rsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b ) );
01016 }

01027     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \

01029     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.m_rep );               \
01030     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
01031 }                                                                             \
01032                                                                               \
01033 inline                                                                        \
01034 void                                                                          \
01035 fnc ( sc_fxval& c, tp a, const sc_fxval& b )                                  \
01036 {                                                                             \
01037     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
01038     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
01039     delete c.m_rep;                                                           \
01040     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *tmp.m_rep, *b.m_rep );               \
01041     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
01042 }
01043 
01044 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
01045 #define DEFN_BIN_FNC_OTHER(fnc)                                               \

01048 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_int_base&)                                        \
01049 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_uint_base&)                                       \
01050 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_signed&)                                          \
01051 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_unsigned&)
01052 #else
01053 #define DEFN_BIN_FNC_OTHER(fnc)
01054 #endif
01055 
01056 #define DEFN_BIN_FNC(fnc)                                                     \
01057 inline                                                                        \
01058 void                                                                          \
01059 fnc( sc_fxval& c, const sc_fxval& a, const sc_fxval& b )                      \
01060 {                                                                             \
01061     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
01062     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
01063     delete c.m_rep;                                                           \
01064     c.m_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.m_rep );                 \
01065     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                             \
01066 }                                                                             \
01067                                                                               \
01068 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,int)                                                       \

01071 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,unsigned long)                                             \
01072 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,float)                                                    \
01073 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,double)                                                    \
01074 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const char*)                                               \
01075 DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                      \

01077 
01078 DEFN_BIN_FNC(mult)
01079 DEFN_BIN_FNC(div)
01080 DEFN_BIN_FNC(add)

01085 #undef DEFN_BIN_FNC
01086 
01087 
01088 inline
01089 void
01090 lshift( sc_fxval& c, const sc_fxval& a, int b )
01091 {
01092     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01093     delete c.m_rep;
01094     c.m_rep = sc_dt::lsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b );
01095     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
01096 }
01097 
01098 inline
01099 void
01100 rshift( sc_fxval& c, const sc_fxval& a, int b )
01101 {
01102     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01103     delete c.m_rep;
01104     c.m_rep = sc_dt::rsh_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, b );
01105     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
01106 }

01108 
01109 // relational (including equality) operators
01110 
01111 #define DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,tp)                                              \
01112 inline                                                                        \
01113 bool                                                                          \
01114 operator op ( const sc_fxval& a, tp b )                                       \
01115 {                                                                             \
01116     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
01117     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
01118     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *tmp.m_rep );                \
01119     return ( ret );                                                           \
01120 }                                                                             \
01121                                                                               \
01122 inline                                                                        \
01123 bool                                                                          \
01124 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxval& b )                                       \
01125 {                                                                             \
01126     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
01127     sc_fxval tmp( a );                                                        \
01128     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *tmp.m_rep, *b.m_rep );                \
01129     return ( ret );                                                           \
01130 }
01131 
01132 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
01133 #define DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER(op,ret)                                             \
01134 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,int64)                                                   \
01135 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,uint64)                                                  \
01136 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
01137 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
01138 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_signed&)                                        \
01139 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_unsigned&)
01140 #else
01141 #define DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER(op,ret)
01142 #endif
01143 
01144 #define DEFN_REL_OP(op,ret)                                                   \
01145 inline                                                                        \
01146 bool                                                                          \
01147 operator op ( const sc_fxval& a, const sc_fxval& b)                           \
01148 {                                                                             \
01149     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                              \
01150     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
01151     int result = sc_dt::cmp_scfx_rep( *a.m_rep, *b.m_rep );                  \
01152     return ( ret );                                                           \
01153 }                                                                             \
01154                                                                               \
01155 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,int)                                                     \
01156 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,unsigned int)                                            \
01157 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,long)                                                    \
01158 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,unsigned long)                                           \
01159 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,float)                                                  \
01160 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,double)                                                  \
01161 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const char*)                                             \
01162 DEFN_REL_OP_T(op,ret,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
01163 DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER(op,ret)
01164 
01165 DEFN_REL_OP(<,result < 0)
01166 DEFN_REL_OP(<=,result <= 0)
01167 DEFN_REL_OP(>,result > 0 && result != 2)
01168 DEFN_REL_OP(>=,result >= 0 && result != 2)
01169 DEFN_REL_OP(==,result == 0)
01170 DEFN_REL_OP(!=,result != 0)
01171 
01172 #undef DEFN_REL_OP_T
01173 #undef DEFN_REL_OP_OTHER
01174 #undef DEFN_REL_OP
01175 
01176 
01177 // assignment operators
01178 
01179 inline
01180 sc_fxval&
01181 sc_fxval::operator = ( const sc_fxval& a )
01182 {
01183     if( &a != this )
01184     {
01185         SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01186         *m_rep = *a.m_rep;
01187         SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
01188     }
01189     return *this;
01190 }
01191 
01192 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(tp)                                                     \
01193 inline                                                                        \
01194 sc_fxval&                                                                     \
01195 sc_fxval::operator = ( tp b )                                                 \
01196 {                                                                             \
01197     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
01198     *m_rep = *tmp.m_rep;                                                      \
01199     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
01200     return *this;                                                             \
01201 }
01202 
01203 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(int)
01204 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(unsigned int)
01205 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(long)
01206 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(unsigned long)
01207 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(float)
01208 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(double)
01209 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const char*)
01210 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_fxval_fast&)
01211 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
01212 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(int64)
01213 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(uint64)
01214 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_int_base&)
01215 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_uint_base&)
01216 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_signed&)
01217 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(const sc_unsigned&)
01218 #endif
01219 
01220 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
01221 
01222 
01223 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,tp)                                              \
01224 inline                                                                        \
01225 sc_fxval&                                                                     \
01226 sc_fxval::operator op ( tp b )                                                \
01227 {                                                                             \
01228     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                          \
01229     sc_fxval tmp( b );                                                        \
01230     scfx_rep* new_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *m_rep, *tmp.m_rep );       \
01231     delete m_rep;                                                             \
01232     m_rep = new_rep;                                                          \
01233     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
01234     return *this;                                                             \
01235 }
01236 
01237 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
01238 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)                                             \
01239 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,int64)                                                   \
01240 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,uint64)                                                  \
01241 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_int_base&)                                      \
01242 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_uint_base&)                                     \
01243 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_signed&)                                        \
01244 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_unsigned&)
01245 #else
01246 #define DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)
01247 #endif
01248 
01249 #define DEFN_ASN_OP(op,fnc)                                                   \
01250 inline                                                                        \
01251 sc_fxval&                                                                     \
01252 sc_fxval::operator op ( const sc_fxval& b )                                   \
01253 {                                                                             \
01254     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )                                          \
01255     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                              \
01256     scfx_rep* new_rep = sc_dt::fnc ## _scfx_rep( *m_rep, *b.m_rep );         \
01257     delete m_rep;                                                             \
01258     m_rep = new_rep;                                                          \
01259     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                         \
01260     return *this;                                                             \
01261 }                                                                             \
01262                                                                               \
01263 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,int)                                                     \
01264 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,unsigned int)                                            \
01265 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,long)                                                    \
01266 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,unsigned long)                                           \
01267 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,float)                                                  \
01268 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,double)                                                  \
01269 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const char*)                                             \
01270 DEFN_ASN_OP_T(op,fnc,const sc_fxval_fast&)                                    \
01271 DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER(op,fnc)
01272 
01273 DEFN_ASN_OP(*=,mult)
01274 DEFN_ASN_OP(/=,div)
01275 DEFN_ASN_OP(+=,add)
01276 DEFN_ASN_OP(-=,sub)
01277 
01278 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_T
01279 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP_OTHER
01280 #undef DEFN_ASN_OP

01282 
01283 inline
01284 sc_fxval&
01285 sc_fxval::operator <<= ( int b )
01286 {
01287     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
01288     m_rep->lshift( b );
01289     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
01290     return *this;
01291 }
01292 
01293 inline
01294 sc_fxval&
01295 sc_fxval::operator >>= ( int b )
01296 {
01297     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
01298     m_rep->rshift( b );
01299     SC_FXVAL_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
01300     return *this;
01301 }

01304 // auto-increment and auto-decrement
01305 
01306 inline
01307 const sc_fxval
01308 sc_fxval::operator ++ ( int )
01309 {
01310     sc_fxval c = *this;
01311     (*this) += 1;
01312     return c;
01313 }
01314 
01315 inline
01316 const sc_fxval
01317 sc_fxval::operator -- ( int )
01318 {
01319     sc_fxval c = *this;
01320     (*this) -= 1;
01321     return c;
01322 }
01323 
01324 inline
01325 sc_fxval&
01326 sc_fxval::operator ++ ()
01327 {
01328     (*this) += 1;
01329     return *this;
01330 }
01331 
01332 inline
01333 sc_fxval&
01334 sc_fxval::operator -- ()
01335 {
01336     (*this) -= 1;
01337     return *this;
01338 }

01541

01543 
01544 inline
01545 sc_fxval_fast_observer*
01546 sc_fxval_fast::observer() const
01547 {
01548     return m_observer;
01549 }
01550 
01551 
01552 // public constructors
01553 
01554 inline
01555 sc_fxval_fast::sc_fxval_fast( sc_fxval_fast_observer* observer_ )
01556 : m_val( 0.0 ),
01557   m_observer( observer_ )
01558 {
01559     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
01560     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )
01561 }
01562 
01563 inline
01564 sc_fxval_fast::sc_fxval_fast( const sc_fxval_fast& a,
01565                               sc_fxval_fast_observer* observer_ )
01566 : m_val( a.m_val ),
01567   m_observer( observer_ )
01568 {
01569     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_
01570     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01571     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )
01572     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
01573 }
01574 
01575 #define DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,arg)                                                   \
01576 inline                                                                        \
01577 sc_fxval_fast::sc_fxval_fast( tp a,                                           \
01578                               sc_fxval_fast_observer* observer_ )             \
01579 : m_val( arg ),                                                               \
01580   m_observer( observer_ )                                                     \
01581 {                                                                             \
01582     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_                                           \
01583     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_CONSTRUCT_( *this )                                \
01584     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )                                    \
01585 }
01586 
01587 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_A(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,static_cast<double>( a ))
01588 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_B(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,from_string( a ))
01589 #define DEFN_CTOR_T_C(tp) DEFN_CTOR_T(tp,a.to_double())
01590 
01591 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(int)
01592 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(unsigned int)
01593 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(long)
01594 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(unsigned long)

01596 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(double)
01597 DEFN_CTOR_T_B(const char*)
01598 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_fxval&)
01599 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER

01601 DEFN_CTOR_T_A(uint64)
01602 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_int_base&)
01603 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_uint_base&)
01604 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_signed&)
01605 DEFN_CTOR_T_C(const sc_unsigned&)
01606 #endif
01607

01664 void
01665 neg( sc_fxval_fast& c, const sc_fxval_fast& a )
01666 {
01667     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01668     c.m_val = - a.m_val;
01669     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )
01670 }

01673 // binary operators
01674 
01675 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,tp)                                                  \
01676 inline                                                                        \
01677 const sc_fxval_fast                                                           \
01678 operator op ( const sc_fxval_fast& a, tp b )                                  \
01679 {                                                                             \
01680     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
01681     sc_fxval_fast tmp( b );                                                   \
01682     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val op tmp.m_val );                             \
01683 }                                                                             \
01684                                                                               \
01685 inline                                                                        \
01686 const sc_fxval_fast                                                           \
01687 operator op ( tp a, const sc_fxval_fast& b )                                  \
01688 {                                                                             \
01689     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
01690     sc_fxval_fast tmp( a );                                                   \
01691     return sc_fxval_fast( tmp.m_val op b.m_val );                             \
01692 }
01693 
01694 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
01695 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op)                                                 \
01696 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,int64)                                                       \
01697 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,uint64)                                                      \
01698 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const sc_int_base&)                                          \
01699 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const sc_uint_base&)                                         \
01700 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const sc_signed&)                                            \
01701 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const sc_unsigned&)
01702 #else
01703 #define DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op)
01704 #endif
01705 
01706 #define DEFN_BIN_OP(op,dummy)                                                 \
01707 inline                                                                        \
01708 const sc_fxval_fast                                                           \
01709 operator op ( const sc_fxval_fast& a, const sc_fxval_fast& b )                \
01710 {                                                                             \
01711     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
01712     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
01713     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val op b.m_val );                               \
01714 }                                                                             \
01715                                                                               \
01716 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,int)                                                         \
01717 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,unsigned int)                                                \
01718 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,long)                                                        \
01719 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,unsigned long)                                               \
01720 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,float)                                                      \
01721 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,double)                                                      \
01722 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(op,const char*)                                                 \
01723 DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(op)
01724 
01725 DEFN_BIN_OP(*,mult)
01726 DEFN_BIN_OP(+,add)
01727 DEFN_BIN_OP(-,sub)
01728 //DEFN_BIN_OP(/,div)
01729 inline
01730 const sc_fxval_fast
01731 operator / ( const sc_fxval_fast& a, const sc_fxval_fast& b )
01732 {
01733     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01734     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )
01735     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val / b.m_val );
01736 }
01737 
01738 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,int)
01739 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,unsigned int)
01740 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,long)
01741 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,unsigned long)
01742 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,float)
01743 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,double)
01744 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,const char*)
01745 //DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER(/)
01746 #ifndef SC_FX_EXCLUDE_OTHER
01747 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,int64)
01748 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,uint64)
01749 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,const sc_int_base&)
01750 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,const sc_uint_base&)
01751 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,const sc_signed&)
01752 DEFN_BIN_OP_T(/,const sc_unsigned&)
01753 #endif
01754 
01755 
01756 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP_T
01757 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP_OTHER
01758 #undef DEFN_BIN_OP
01759 
01760 
01761 inline
01762 const sc_fxval_fast
01763 operator << ( const sc_fxval_fast& a, int b )
01764 {
01765     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01766     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val * scfx_pow2( b ) );
01767 }
01768 
01769 inline
01770 const sc_fxval_fast
01771 operator >> ( const sc_fxval_fast& a, int b )
01772 {
01773     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01774     return sc_fxval_fast( a.m_val * scfx_pow2( -b ) );
01775 }

01780 #define DEFN_BIN_FNC_T(fnc,op,tp)                                             \
01781 inline                                                                        \
01782 void                                                                          \
01783 fnc ( sc_fxval_fast& c, const sc_fxval_fast& a, tp b )                        \
01784 {                                                                             \
01785     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )                                         \
01786     sc_fxval_fast tmp( b );                                                   \
01787     c.m_val = a.m_val op tmp.m_val;                                           \
01788     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                        \
01789 }                                                                             \
01790                                                                               \
01791 inline                                                                        \
01792 void                                                                          \
01793 fnc ( sc_fxval_fast& c, tp a, const sc_fxval_fast& b )                        \
01794 {                                                                             \
01795     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( b )                                         \
01796     sc_fxval_fast tmp( a );                                                   \
01797     c.m_val = tmp.m_val op b.m_val;                                           \
01798     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( c )                                        \
01799 }

01926 // assignment operators
01927 
01928 inline
01929 sc_fxval_fast&
01930 sc_fxval_fast::operator = ( const sc_fxval_fast& a )
01931 {
01932     if( &a != this )
01933     {
01934         SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( a )
01935         m_val = a.m_val;
01936         SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
01937     }
01938     return *this;
01939 }

02033     m_val *= scfx_pow2( b );
02034     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
02035     return *this;
02036 }

02043     m_val *= scfx_pow2( -b );
02044     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
02045     return *this;

02055     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
02056     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
02057     double c = m_val;
02058     m_val = m_val + 1;
02059     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
02060     return sc_fxval_fast( c );
02061 }

02068     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
02069     double c = m_val;
02070     m_val = m_val - 1;
02071     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_WRITE_( *this )
02072     return sc_fxval_fast( c );
02073 }

02140 inline
02141 unsigned int
02142 sc_fxval_fast::to_uint() const

02144     // SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in to_uint64
02145     return static_cast<unsigned int>( to_uint64() );
02146 }
02147 
02148 inline
02149 uint64
02150 sc_fxval_fast::to_uint64() const
02151 {
02152     // SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in is_normal
02153     if (!is_normal())
02154     {
02155         return 0;
02156     }
02157 
02158     int exponent;
02159     double mantissa_dbl = frexp(m_val, &exponent);
02160 
02161     uint64 mantissa = static_cast<uint64>(fabs(mantissa_dbl) * (UINT64_ONE << 53));
02162     exponent -= 53;
02163 
02164     if (!(-64 < exponent && exponent < 64))
02165     {
02166         return 0;
02167     }
02168 
02169     mantissa = exponent >= 0 ? mantissa << exponent : mantissa >> -exponent;
02170     return mantissa_dbl >= 0 ? mantissa : -mantissa;
02171 }
02172

02174 long
02175 sc_fxval_fast::to_long() const
02176 {
02177     // SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_ in to_uint64
02178     return static_cast<long>( to_uint64() );
02179 }

02186     return static_cast<unsigned long>( to_uint64() );
02187 }

02240     scfx_ieee_double id( m_val );
02241     return id.is_inf();
02242 }
02243 
02244 inline
02245 bool
02246 sc_fxval_fast::is_normal() const
02247 {
02248     SC_FXVAL_FAST_OBSERVER_READ_( *this )
02249     scfx_ieee_double id( m_val );
02250     return ( id.is_normal() || id.is_subnormal() || id.is_zero() );
02251 }
